The severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) is responsible for an ongoing pandemic that has already killed over 320,000 people and paralyzed the global economy (1).… [+12087 chars]

articles.author: Seth Palmer & Patrick Crozier
articles.title: COVID-19 vaccine trials begin at Rochester General Hospital - 13WHAM-TV
articles.description: Rochester, N. Y. - Work is underway for members of Rochester Regional Health and UR Medicine hoping to help develop a COVID-19 vaccine. The healthcare organizations have worked on recruiting dozens of people from out area to take part in a new clinical trial …
